title.narrative: ICRD International Center for Religion and Diplomacy - Syria and Neighbourhood (2021-2023)

description.narrative:
Objective: To contribute to the promotion of social cohesion, counter GBV, improve mental health and psycho-social well-being amongst vulnerable children and their families
Under this new initiative, ICRD and its partners, will: commission the development 10 new animated episodes of 1001 Nights which will take place in ancient Levant (Syria, Lebanon and Jordan), featuring representative characters and venues, and based upon issues of central import to the Syrian crisis, GBV and mental health. The program will be distributed using various online channels (Outcome area 2) as well as in formal and informal learning environments in Lebanon to dramatically expand its beneficiaries. Big Bad Boo Studios will be contracted to develop the new episodes (activities 1.2 and 1.3) with research (activity 1.1) led by ICRD and INITIATE and technical support throughout Result 1 provided by MEHE/CERD, UNICEF and other stakeholders.
